duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in the detection of fermentation and/or manufacturing capabilities of Contract Manufacturing Organizations (CMO) for the Human Oligosaccharide Project.
Assist and advice in matters regarding technology transfer of established synthesis process to CMO.
Provide advice to determine cost saving measures for the production of oligosaccharides through fermentation techniques.
Intervene in Technology Transfer activities, reports at the conclusion of these will be required.
Provide advice and guidance in sessions appropriately designed for such exchanges.
